tool_description: A variety of emails sourced from web scrapes and publicly available mega data breaches
name: Email Lists
title: Email Lists

api_list.name: Domain Counts
api_list.description: how many of each email are from which domain
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-lists.p.rapidapi.com/lists/twitter/twitterDomainCounts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-lists.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
